IX.iii.1.E.3.
a
.
Combined Rate Payable to Veterans Married to Each Other
A special combined maximum annual pension rate applies to Veterans who are married to each other.  This is the same rate as for a Veteran with a dependent, unless both of the Veterans are eligible for SMP.
Reference
:  For more information on the special combined rate, see the
pension rate tables
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E - Pension - Basic Rate Determinations
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E
